attributes.action: Put a cap on what Landlords can charge for renting
attributes.additional_details: Put a cap on rent how much a month they can charge landlords
attributes.background: We need to cap the rent To make it more fairer for everyone

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Rental prices are based on a number of factors including the size of the property and location. Decisions on the level of rent is a contractual decision for both parties. 

You might like to sign this petition calling for a cap on rent increases

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623326
